channel.title: E-Scape | Join now! | Vote | Quests | 24/7 | Unique | 2x Events | Lots Of Fun
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3pIQtI7.png[/img]
E-Scape V3
Server Status: Online
Hey guys, Defective here I've been working on a server since i lost my drivers licence, all i hope to achieve from this server is [COLOR="#00FF00"]FUN[/COLOR] I'm not looking to have the top server but hope to at least one day get up and fight these big servers and struggle through as a little guy.
Hosted on Fast 136mb/s D and 58mb/s U on 2gb ram, daily backups, 24/7 uptime VPS
ECO || PVM || PVP || Great Eco || Great Staff || 120+ Registered Members || Loyalty Points/Ranks || Much to do || Custom Dicing || Vote4Rewards || Professional Website || Double EXP Weekends || Custom Content || Great Community || Custom Quests || Custom Minigames
[color=green]Website: [url=http://defectivegaming.com]Click Here[/url] Forums: [url=http://defectivegaming.proboards.com]Click Here[/url] Webclient: [url=http://defectivegaming.com/webclient.html]Click Here[/url] Client Download: [URL=http://"http://defectivegaming.com/client/E-Scape%20Client.jar"]Click Here[/URL] [/COLOR]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/f8364e5a78c22dadd2dc22b9c276df0a.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/badf0fdc50740223b03fb7f544398bed.png[/img] Tormented Demons Added! Boss Teleport/Tormented Demons [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6j3Xodr.png[/img] New Custom Zombie Minigame [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NDKwt4m.png[/img] New Total 8 Unique players online [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/m0VgRuO.png[/img] Hit first page on the toplist. Thanks to everyone! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7VFg634.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6TbnIam.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/E9MO86q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tDk0OpC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9x2mNLV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MUkDHfL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TENMW6L.png[/img]
BETA Release Date: [color=green][URL=http://"http://defectivegaming.com"]Online Now[/URL][/COLOR] Official Release Date: UNKNOWN but hopfully by 14/08/2014
